name: Bovista
Relationship: Compare: Calc.; Rhus; Sepia; Cicuta.Bovista antidotes tar applications. Suffocation from gas. After Rhus in chronic urticaria.

Head: Discharge from nose STRINGY, tough
STAMMERING  Scalp itches; worse, warmth; sensitive; must scratch until sore
Sensation AS IF HEAD WERE ENLARGING, especially of occiput
Distensive headache; worse early morning, open air, lying
Dull, bruised pain in brain
Stomach: Sensation as of a lump of ice
Intolerant of tight clothing around waist
Abdomen: COLIC, with red urine; RELIEVED BY EATING
Chronic diarrhoea of old people; worse at night and early morning
Stitches through perineum towards rectum and genitals
Face: ACNE worse in summer; due to use of cosmetics
Scurf and crusts about nostrils and corners of mouth
Female: Leucorrhoea acrid, thick, tough, greenish, follows menses
CANNOT BEAR TIGHT CLOTHING AROUND WAIST  TRACES OF MENSES BETWEEN MENSTRUATION
Menses too early and too profuse; WORSE AT NIGHT
Skin: URTICARIA ON EXCITEMENT; with rheumatic lameness, palpitation and diarrhoea
Blunt instruments leave deep impression on the skin
Urticaria on waking in the morning, worse from bathing
Pimples cover the entire body; scurvy; herpetic eruptions
Eczema, moist; formation of thick crusts
Extremities: Great weakness of all joints; clumsiness with her hands, drops things from hands
Moist eczema on back of hand

details: Has a marked effect on the skin, producing eruption like eczema, also upon the circulation, predisposing to Hemorrhages; marked languor and lassitude. Adapted to stammering children, old maids with palpitation; and tettery patients. Stage of numbness and tingling in multiple neuritis. Asphyxia due to charcoal fumes.
